title: PC 11 March - "The EU is the Palazzo degli Imperialisti" Appeal of the Greek Communists against the European elections
content:
Communist proletarians shares the position of the boycott

***

The EU isthe palaceof the imperialists

Is an instrument of exploitation, employment and oppression of workers and peoples

It is a bastion of racism and war

Outside the European Parliament, against the EU is the path of workers and of the peoples!

Abstention from the European elections!

The elections for the European Parliament of May-June will take place in a period of attack on several levels to rights of the peoples of Europe and also in a period of war and bloody conflicts in the European continent.

In all previous years, the powers Dominating imperialists in the European Union have consolidated exploitation e the looting of peoples and workers in European countries. Have been implemented extreme austerity policies, the poor and the middle classes were crushed with cuts in wages and attacks on their rights at work, and i peasants saw theactionof the Pac politics that target them. Young people have continued to be at the center of the attack with European policies that affect workers' rightsAnd The right to study; Furthermore, not only the policies of Bologna have not brought better days for the young people who study, but have the study conditions worse and even forced many students to abandon their studies. Young workers, the poor young people of the class worker, those who live inlimitsof poverty, migrants and "second class citizens", As they are called, they suffered a serious blow. On the one hand were the first todoveraccept the measures of cuts and austerity; on the other hand, they saw theirs trampled on democratic rights.

In all developments of recent years, The European Union is once again emerging as a force that supports e He participates in unjust wars, a strength responsible for the massacre of peoples. The unfair war in Ukraine, in addition tobrand nameof the imperialists of Russia and the United States, It also brings the EU intervention brand and support to groups Fascists and far right. At the same time, the current ethnic cleaning Against the Palestinian people they have the support of the forces of the European Union. There repression and the ban on solidarity mobilizations to the Palestinian people It is the main direction of EU countries. Parliament's decision European -to vast majority- to recognize "the right of Israel The self -defense "while a prolonged massacre of a people who have lived for years under the employment of the fascist state of Israel is An evident example of how democratic and humanitarian it isthe palaceEU. It's clear that solidarity with the Palestinian people and the struggle for freedom in Palestine mean abstaining frompalazzoWARDNIUM OF THE EUROPEAN EU AND ABSANTEE WITH from the European elections.

The policies of extreme racism, the rise of Extreme right parties in the countries of the European Union and in Parliament European are supported and support reactionary, racist policies and anti -communists of the main systemic forces. New forces have emerged and yes old forces are strengthened, which represent the extremes of capitalism, of exploitation and social, ethnic, religious discrimination, cultural and gender. All this ideological and political offensive you are carried out parallel to the attack on rights and conquests for decades it was necessary for EU imperialist bourgeoisie. It was necessary to put under the reflectors the workers and oppressed and give them the blame for the crisis in course. These far -right and fascist policies not only do not oppose to the EU, but they are "meat and blood". This is political perception of the capitalist imperialist system that manifests itself when in crisis or in danger.

At the same time, the pandemic crisis e The Sars-Covid 19 epidemic, although initially they have created a problem with production process and the capitalist system as a whole, they are transformed into an opportunity for a further attack through laws Anti-Opera and anti-Popolar.

The myth of "Europe of peoples", of socio-human face of the European Union now shows its true face. The face of war, exploitation and barbarism. The face imperialism-capitism that is interested only in the reproduction of his profits and his political supremacy on his opponents. It is obvious for Anyone who wants to see him that a handful of imperialist countries is governing The EU. Promote the exploitation of the bourgeoisie against all other peoples and the working classes and at the same time squeezes the wealth fromremainingEmployee countries. This is the reality of the European Union. Athe uniondominateafrom contradictions and antagonism, athe unionforato fail.

This rotten building and exploiter also has need a semblance of democracy to be sold to the people. AND' the European Parliament must be used to disorient citizens and convince them that you can change and fix. But the truth is that Parliament European is a puppet without any significant and decisive function, one show set up to deceive the peoples of Europe and to distract them from their struggle. It is a "greenhouse" in which the lobby of the system grow, in which The only thing that the so -called MEP obey are the "bags of money "available to capitalists to promote their interests inside and outside the EU.

We support the struggles of peoples and workers. These are the struggles that the governments of the EU countries are criticizing e denigrating. We support the strikes that broke out in France for the law of citizens to a pension to live with, the workers' strikes of transport in Germany and Spain. We support the struggles of the farmers, such as Recently in France and Greece. The continuation and the path to the justice for the struggles of workers and peoples does not pass through The acceptance of miserable illusions on the European Parliament and the EU. The mobilizations of workers are the hope of a better future for workers and peoples of Europe.

The Via dei Popoli is outside the European Parliament And against the EU, a way of solidarity and brotherhood. For a life with Rights and conquests against imperialism and exploitation. A life that can be conquered only by a common front of the peoples against this alliance Barbara and reactionary of imperialists and capitalists.

All of us who sign this document, left and communist organizations, we refuse to legitimize the operation embellishment of a historically reactionary imperialist construct. There We refuse to participate in a farcical and mocking process like that of European elections. We ask for mass abstention from the European elections and We actively fight to bring workers' movements to the front line in the struggles. We ask Europe's peoples not to vote in the European elections because they are a farce and to become active subjects in the fight against European Union policies. We ask the Democrats and the progressives of put an end to the warfounding policies supported by the European Union they have brought the war totheourand vicinity. We are fighting to bring out our countries frompalazzoof European Union. We support the right of peoples to fight for their rights, for one society without exploitation and wars. We ask for mass abstention from European elections and active and mass participation in popular struggles.

·No to the European Union of Capitalists and imperialists!

·Abstention from the elections European!

·Down the policies Antiopeia of austerity and social barbarism!

·Class front Internationalist-anti-imperialistOf European workers and peoples against war, Racism and fascism!
